tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE virtual_assistants (id INT, name VARCHAR(255), sentiment_score FLOAT, feedback TEXT);
CREATE TABLE user_sentiments (id INT, user_id INT, assistant_id INT, sentiment FLOAT, feedback TEXT);

CREATE TABLE UserInteraction (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    assistant_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE UserSentimentAnalysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    positive_sentiment BOOL,
    negative_sentiment BOOL,
    neutral_sentiment BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE UserSentimentAnalysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    sentiment_score FLOAT NOT NULL,
    analysis_date DATE NOT NULL,
    analysis_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    user_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    user_country VARCHAR(50),
    user_registered_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE VirtualAssistantUsers (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    assistant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    assistant_language VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT
);
